backgroundStory: Quantum Falcon never aimed for fame; the world kept finding them. Practice made patterns; patterns made plans. the Library Fire drew a circle; Sneaky Lattice 89 stood just beyond it. Plans fail; patterns don’t. That is enough.

Rumor says Lofty Eagle trained where maps fade and names blur. A knack for magnetism became a habit; a habit became a legend. On the night of the Broken Gate, the feud with Electric Lynx began in earnest. Maps change, but Electric Overmind 20 still meets them at the quiet corners. Tomorrow is a moving target; that’s fine.

Shadow Falcon never aimed for fame; the world kept finding them. They tuned their instincts until silence had seams to pull. Since then, Stormy Warden keeps pace, trading signals and patience. Tomorrow is a moving target; that’s fine.

Raised far from the spotlight, Merry Carp learned odd tricks early. A knack for timeWarp became a habit; a habit became a legend. the Latch Puzzle was the first time they read Hollow Drone's rhythm. If the city holds its breath, Merry Dog counts the beats with them. They carry the night like a toolkit and walk on.

Every road bent a little when Neon Bear passed by. A knack for superStrength became a habit; a habit became a legend. the Echo Fault was the first time they read Silver Smith's rhythm. When angles get tight, Shadow Dog lends a steadier line. No banners. No speeches. Just the work.

Neon Lynx prefers the edges of things—alleys, archives, antenna arrays. People noticed the way tools behaved around them—especially under pressure. If the city holds its breath, Cosmic Moose counts the beats with them. They carry the night like a toolkit and walk on.
